alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Fremont, southern Jefferson, northwestern Bonneville, western Madison and north central Bingham Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 353 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Roberts to near Taber. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Rexburg, Rigby, Terreton, Lorenzo, Ammon, Shelley, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon, Menan, Teton, Roberts, Firth, Lewisville, Mud Lake, Archer, Plano, Basalt and Sage Junction. Those attending the Ammon Days, War Bonnet Round Up, and Bonneville County Fair are in the path of these storms and should prepare for IMMINENT DANGEROUS WEATHER CONDITIONS. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
